title: LF DUO, high silver low gold.
body: Hey guys, looking for a duo. Pref to have comms. I was gold 1 in season 4 but havn't been playing since. Looking to re learn most of the game and rise on the ladder :)

replies.body: Hi LIL I finished up in gold 5 last season and currently silver 2, hit me up - 21st Century Fox is my ign. :)

Me too. Reached Gold III last season. Currently Silver I.

Let's help each other get places we've never been - [INSERT JOKE ABOUT III'S MUM HERE]

By the way, I'm toxic as all hell. Like, wow, after every game I reflect on how shit of a person I am - win or lose.
